subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets lost to the Astros, the worst team in the major leagues, by 3-1 on Friday night at Citi Field, dropping 12 games under .500, a low for them this season.
snippet: The Mets lost to the Astros, the worst team in the major leagues, by 3-1 on Friday night at Citi Field, dropping 12 games under .500, a low for them this season.
